name: False Gods
description:
False Gods is an Ability/Hero FPS boss battle. It can be played single-player or up to 4-player lan/online! This was created in 8 months as our senior year project. Please let us know if you give it a play, would love to hear your thoughts!

The Team:

Anita He - Producer/Game Designer
Adriana Matic- Level Designer/Network Programmer
Justin San Juan - Gameplay Programmer/Game Designer
Peter Francis - Game Designer/Sound Designer
Sanaa Memon- Game Designer/3D Artist

All other proper credits were given inside the game under "CREDITS".
